text: Loleatta Holloway (November 5, 1946 â€“ March 21, 2011) was an American singer. She was known mainly for disco songs, such as "Hit and Run" and "Love Sensation". Holloway was born in Chicago, Illinois. She died there from heart failure. Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:American singer-songwriters Category:1946 births Category:2011 deaths
title: Loleatta Holloway
